publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3287 Brian Adam: Western Peripheral Route Fundingâ€”That the Parliament notes the Chancellor's spending review announcement; further notes that the Scottish Executive has transport as one of its five priorities, and calls upon the Executive to make the allocation of resources for the construction of the western peripheral route around Aberdeen, with a third bridge over the River Don, as its top priority.
S1M-3287 Western Peripheral Route Funding (lodged on 22 July 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3287 Western Peripheral Route Funding (lodged on 22 July 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3287 Western Peripheral Route Funding (lodged on 22 July 2002) Helen Eadie*
